Organizing Apathy

I won't vote for Candidate A if you won't vote for Candidate B.
Save yourself a trip to the polls.

Find Out More

Match and offset your vote today!

Why travel to a polling location when you can deliver just as much impact from your desk? Simply match with an opposing supporter, sit back, and block the vote. Both of you save precious time by willingly disenfranchising.

Launching in time for Election Day 2016!
